Worked in the Cross-Asset Strats team of Fixed Income Division (FID)
- Built a dashboard showcasing comparative analysis of the firm's performance across various asset classes in different regions versus peers in the industry, along with the projection of performance by year-end, thereby helping in building strategy on which asset class and region to emphasize on

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Worked in the Financial Market Advisory (FMA) team• Regression Engine: Implemented Binary Logistic Regression to calculate 12-month transition rates between three stages of loans- Automated entire process of calculating forward-looking predictions by creating a regression aggregation engine in Python, increasing the time efficiency by 95%, helping client in result analysis vs results production• Automated Cash Management Libraries: Developed a model transformation library for wide to long format conversion of BS and PnL, which can be imported off-the-shelves by client- Enhanced functionality to include calculate key ratios, QoQ & YoY changes of the item in BS and PnL, improving time efficiency by 80%, and reducing manpower requirements• Portfolio Risk Evaluation - Liquidity Assessment, Haircut Analysis- Analyzed the risk of a portfolio of the client by assessing the transaction cost of disposition,Value at Risk and provided a detailed Haircut Assessment and cushion analysis- Contributed to building reports at CLO transnational level for the client, highlighting thequality the underlying collateral of tranches and the future of LIBOR replacement process
experience.description_html: Worked in the Financial Market Advisory (FMA) team• Regression Engine: Implemented Binary Logistic Regression to calculate 12-month transition rates between three stages of loans- Automated entire process of calculating forward-looking predictions by creating a regression aggregation engine in Python, increasing the time efficiency by 95%, helping client in result analysis vs results production• Automated Cash Management Libraries: Developed a model transformation library for wide to long format conversion of BS and PnL, which can be imported off-the-shelves by client- Enhanced functionality to include calculate key ratios, QoQ & YoY changes of the item in BS and PnL, improving time efficiency by 80%, and reducing manpower requirements• Portfolio Risk Evaluation - Liquidity Assessment, Haircut Analysis- Analyzed the risk of a portfolio of the client by assessing the transaction cost of disposition,Value at Risk and provided a detailed Haircut Assessment and cushion analysis- Contributed to building reports at CLO transnational level for the client, highlighting thequality the underlying collateral of tranches and the future of LIBOR replacement process

experience.title: Decision Support Analyst
experience.description: • Resolved co-references in search queries written in plain English for fetching information by using mention-ranking co-reference model• Parsed CoNLL 2012 dataset using the spacy library and trained a neural network to identify correct mention of co-referential pronouns• Added rules using NLP tools like NER tagger &Dependency Tree, increased resolution accuracy by 10% for database related queries
experience.description_html: • Resolved co-references in search queries written in plain English for fetching information by using mention-ranking co-reference model• Parsed CoNLL 2012 dataset using the spacy library and trained a neural network to identify correct mention of co-referential pronouns• Added rules using NLP tools like NER tagger &Dependency Tree, increased resolution accuracy by 10% for database related queries <!---->

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: •Responsible for implementing the Pair Trading Strategy (Spread Trading) using the concept of Kalman Filter•Built a 1-D Linear Kalman Filter Model for the estimation of the hedging ratio of pairs, getting better estimates using noise removal Kalman method•Backtested the model on five-year historical data of equity pairs in different sectors with mean cumulative P&L of INR 3800 per spread
experience.description_html: •Responsible for implementing the Pair Trading Strategy (Spread Trading) using the concept of Kalman Filter•Built a 1-D Linear Kalman Filter Model for the estimation of the hedging ratio of pairs, getting better estimates using noise removal Kalman method•Backtested the model on five-year historical data of equity pairs in different sectors with mean cumulative P&L of INR 3800 per spread <!---->

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: •Built a Hybrid Recommender Model for recommending articles to users for Chinese News Publishing site, incorporating user behavior, trending items, geographical location and other attributes•Implemented the concepts of Content Filtering and Collaborative Filtering and generated highest response rate of 80% from users using Design of Experiment•Co-authored and published research paper on Intelligent Recommender Systems in International Journal of Advanced Research(IJAR) elaborating the methodology of Hybrid Recommender Systems
experience.description_html: •Built a Hybrid Recommender Model for recommending articles to users for Chinese News Publishing site, incorporating user behavior, trending items, geographical location and other attributes•Implemented the concepts of Content Filtering and Collaborative Filtering and generated highest response rate of 80% from users using Design of Experiment•Co-authored and published research paper on Intelligent Recommender Systems in International Journal of Advanced Research(IJAR) elaborating the methodology of Hybrid Recommender Systems

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Worked under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and the alumni. •Responsible for organizing 13th Annual Alumni Meet - the annual event for the reunion of alumni in their alma mater•Part of “My Imprint-Class Gift” Program, designed the entire campaign and coined ideas for Senior Class Gift 2016•Worked in a team of 13 members, raised total sponsorship of 35 lacs and increased the number of sponsors by 45%•Conducted Institute’s Student Alumni Mentorship Program, Alumni Guest Lectures, E-Guest Lectures and Workshops
